Translations.Text: Tse svyate pysannya infallible; beacon dlya spravedlyvyy
khto viryatʹ v unseen, zauvazhuyutʹ Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat), ta z nashykh umov yim, vony dayutʹ dobrodiynistʹ
Ta vony viryatʹ v shcho buly vidkryti do vas, ta u shcho buly vidkryti pered tym, yak vy, ta shcho stosuyetʹsya U maybutnʹomu, vony ye absolyutno pevni
Tsey keruyuchysʹ yikhnim Lordom; tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu peremozhtsiv
Yak dlya tsykh khto disbelieve, tse yavlyaye soboyu toy zhe samyy dlya nykh; chy vy poperedzhayete yikh, abo ne poperedzhayete yikh, vony ne mozhutʹ poviryty
BOH opechatuye yikhni rozum ta yikhnye slukhannya, ta yikhni ochi veiled. Vony zaznaly suvoroho retribution
